name: Material Theme UI Language Additions
description:
Material Theme UI Language Additions is an external plugin for the Material Theme UI plugin, providing access to the specific features currently only available to premium users.


This plugin provides access to the Language Additions feature, which augments the most popular languages by adding more customization options to the color schemes.


Currently supported languages are:

  • Java
  • Kotlin
  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • PHP
  • Python
  • Ruby
  • Go (scheduled for 2022)
  • Swift (scheduled for 2023)
  • and probably more...

This plugin must be loaded alongside Material Theme UI.


Important note: this plugin has no effect if you already have a subscription.
